altername_name: Kirby 64: The Crystal Shards (Wii Virtual Console)
name: Kirby 64: The Crystal Shards
overview: Kirby’s first 3D adventure takes the powerful pink puffball beyond Dream Land and into the stars, as he fights to save his friends from a deadly new enemy: Dark Matter. This cute, colourful platformer features all the Kirby action you could wish for. Swallow enemies to copy their abilities – like fire, ice or electricity – or combine different abilities to create even more powerful effects. Try them all for surprising results! On your quest you’ll explore planets made of lava, water or even sweets; and battle giant bosses as you seek out the scattered Crystal Shards. Kirby 64 also includes three bonus minigames for up to four players.
